title: The Commissioner, by special permission, may permit FSI up to 5 including Zonal (basic) FSI specified in Table No 12foroffice use& other allied purposes except residential use considering the specific requirement of Govt
clause_text: The Commissioner, by special permission, may permit FSI up to 5 including Zonal (basic) FSI specified in Table No 12foroffice use& other allied purposes except residential use considering the specific requirement of Govt./MCGM and their Statutory Bodies, Semi Govt. and PSUs as detailed below:
section: 33(3) Buildings of Government/MCGM/Statutory Bodies, Semi- Government and PSU Offices:
